name: @treinetic/treinetic-epub-reader
description: Treinetic epub reader is a fork of popular readium/readium-js-viewer and customized for the simplicity

scripts.cson2json: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/concat.js "package/*.cson" package.cson && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cson/bin/cson2json package.cson > package.json && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js package.cson && node readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/optimizePackageJsonScripts.js
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:submodule && npm run prepare:local
scripts.prepare:local: (npm outdated || echo outdated) && (npm ci || npm install) && npm run prepare:local:common
scripts.prepare:yarn:all: yarn run prepare:yarn:submodule && yarn run prepare:yarn:local
scripts.prepare:yarn:local: (yarn outdated || echo outdated) && yarn install && yarn run prepare:local:common
scripts.prepare:submodule: cd readium-js && npm run prepare:all && cd .. && ls
scripts.prepare:yarn:submodule: cd readium-js && yarn run prepare:yarn:all && cd .. && ls
scripts.clean: (yarn --version || echo noyarn) && node --version && npm --version && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js api-docs/* && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist
scripts.build:scripts: npm run versioning && npm run build:scripts:multiple && npm run build:scripts:single && npm run build:scripts:single:LITE
scripts.postbuild:scripts:multiple: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/XXX && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/version.json && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/templates && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/migration && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/storage && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/versioning && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/workers && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map build-output/ && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map ) || echo "=== SUCCESS [ignore previous error]: no sourcemaps were generated for zip web-worker, deflate, inflate (no uglification)." ) && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/RequireJS.js.src.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.src.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.src.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.src.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist:copy && npm run dist:cloudReaderLite && npm run dist:cloudReader
scripts.dist+sourcemap: npm run dist && npm run deploy:cloudReader:copy:sourcemap && npm run deploy:cloudReaderLite:copy:sourcemap && npm run deploy:chromeApp:copy:sourcemap
scripts.dist:copy: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/zip_sourcemap && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/z-worker.js.map dist/zip_sourcemap && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/deflate.js.map dist/zip_sourcemap && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/inflate.js.map dist/zip_sourcemap ) || ( echo "=== SUCCESS [ignore previous error]: no sourcemaps were generated for zip web-worker, deflate, inflate (no uglification)." && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist/zip_sourcemap ) )
scripts.dist:cloudReader: npm run dist:cloudReader:copy && npm run dist:cloudReader:css && npm run dist:cloudReader:js
scripts.dist:cloudReader:copy: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/z-worker.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/deflate.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/inflate.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js node_modules/mathjax-single-file/dist/Treinetic/MathJax.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp node_modules/bootstrap/fonts/ dist/cloud-reader/fonts/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/css/annotations.css dist/cloud-reader/css/
scripts.dist:cloudReader:js: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader_sourcemap && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_single-bundle/readium-js-viewer_all.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_single-bundle/readium-js-viewer_all.js.map dist/cloud-reader_sourcemap/
scripts.dist:cloudReaderLite: npm run dist:cloudReaderLite:copy && npm run dist:cloudReaderLite:css && npm run dist:cloudReaderLite:js
scripts.dist:cloudReaderLite:copy: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/z-worker.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/deflate.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/inflate.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js node_modules/mathjax-single-file/dist/Treinetic/MathJax.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp node_modules/bootstrap/fonts/ dist/cloud-reader-lite/fonts/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/css/annotations.css dist/cloud-reader-lite/css/
scripts.dist:cloudReaderLite:js: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader-lite_sourcemap && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_single-bundle/readium-js-viewer_all_LITE.js dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_single-bundle/readium-js-viewer_all_LITE.js.map dist/cloud-reader-lite_sourcemap/
scripts.genOPDS: npm run genOPDS_IDPF_tests && npm run genOPDS_DAISY_tests && npm run genOPDS_IDPF_samples && npm run genOPDS_IDPF_widgets && npm run genOPDS_IDPF_edupub
scripts.genOPDS_IDPF_widgets: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components master /Samples/1-basic_component/embedded FIRST && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components master /Samples/1-basic_component/packaged APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components feature/logger-widget /Samples/Treinetic/tempwave-demo/embedded APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components feature/logger-widget /Samples/Treinetic/tempwave-demo/packaged APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components feature/logger-widget /Samples/Treinetic/logger-demo/packaged APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components feature/logger-widget /Samples/Treinetic/logger-demo/embedded APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components feature/logger-widget /Samples/readium APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components PubCoder /Samples/3-messaging_component/embedded/PubCoder APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components PubCoder /Samples/1-basic_component/embedded/PubCoder APPEND && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_widgets.opds IDPF scriptable-components PubCoder /Samples/1-basic_component/packaged/PubCoder LAST
scripts.genOPDS_IDPF_edupub: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_edu.opds IDPF education master /samples FIRST && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/genOPDS.js epub_content/epub_edu.opds snaekobbi braille-rendition-epub samples /edupub/samples LAST
scripts.dowatch:plugins: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/watch/cli.js "npm run genPluginsConfig && node readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/webbrowser.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js open_webbrowser.js" readium-js/readium-shared-js/plugins/
scripts.dowatch: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/watch/cli.js "npm run build && node readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/webbrowser.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js open_webbrowser.js" dev/ src/ readium-js/js/ readium-js/readium-shared-js/js/ readium-js/readium-shared-js/plugins/
scripts.clean:tests: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist/Readium.crx && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist/cloud-reader/epub_content/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist/testbooks.zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist/testlibrary/
scripts.test: npm run test:firefox && npm run test:chrome
scripts.test:sauce: npm run test:sauce:firefox && npm run test:sauce:chrome
scripts.pretest:travis: npm run dist && npm run crx && npm run deploy:cloudReader:copy:sourcemap && cd dist/cloud-reader && zip -r ../Readium_cloud-reader.zip . -x epub_content* && cd ../.. && npm run deploy:cloudReaderLite:copy:sourcemap && cd dist/cloud-reader-lite && zip -r ../Readium_cloud-reader-lite.zip . && cd ../.. && npm run deploy:cloudReader:copy:epub_content
scripts.deploy:cloudReader:copy:sourcemap: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp dist/cloud-reader_sourcemap/ dist/cloud-reader/scripts/ && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp dist/zip_sourcemap/ dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip/ || echo "=== SUCCESS [ignore previous error]: no sourcemaps were generated for zip web-worker, deflate, inflate (no uglification)." )
scripts.deploy:cloudReaderLite:copy:sourcemap: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp dist/cloud-reader-lite_sourcemap/ dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/ && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp dist/zip_sourcemap/ dist/cloud-reader-lite/scripts/zip/ || echo "=== SUCCESS [ignore previous error]: no sourcemaps were generated for zip web-worker, deflate, inflate (no uglification)." )
scripts.tr_single_file_build: npm run versioning && npm run build:scripts:single:LITE
